description: These dongers are running and the way they are made shows that they are they are in mid stride: one of their arms is up while the other one is down. They often have puffs of air behind them, which is made with ε=. This makes it look as if they are going so fast that they are leaving a dust trail behind them (or else propelled forward by a fart?!).
title: Running with One Arm Up and One Arm Down
